name: Shoot Everything, Touch Nothing.
description:
My submission for the Brackeys 2021.2 game jam with the theme chaos.  I made an astroids-inspired bullet hell where the dead spaceships stay on screen and damage you; leading to a chaotic mess of spaceships and space junk.

The enemies might take a while to come on the screen, the game isn't broken.

If you liked my game (or didn't like it) please leave a comment or a rating!
